definition: a stand at a racecourse or stadium consisting of tiers with rows of individual seats that are under a protective roof, perform ostentatiously in order to impress the audience and with an eye to the applause
details:
noun
- a stand at a racecourse or stadium consisting of tiers with rows of individual seats that are under a protective roof
= synonyms: covered stand
- the audience at a stadium or racetrack
verb
- perform ostentatiously in order to impress the audience and with an eye to the applause
= example: perform ostentatiously in order to impress the audience and with an eye to the applause
